## Loading the data


```{r, include=FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")

library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
candH <- candidates %>%
        filter(cand_office == "H") %>%
        select(cand_id, cand_name, cand_party_affiliation, cand_election_yr)
```
